sentences.en: All of the groups moved towards a broader eclecticism and synthesis.
sentences.cn: 所有的乐队都朝着更广泛的折衷主义和结合主义的方向前进。

sentences.en: Eclecticism is good, that they keeped the style and avoided the defects.
sentences.cn: 兼收并蓄是好, 避免了很多中国传统样式的问题,却依然古色古香.

sentences.en: It's not appropriate to regard neutralism as eclecticism and then criticize or thoroughly abandon it.
sentences.cn: 把“中立”当作折中主义而加以批判和彻底抛弃是不妥当的.

sentences.en: Wang An - shian eclecticism , he inclined to create, and the heart of his thought was reform.
sentences.cn: 王安石博采众长, 他的经学思想是以变革为中心的,重在创新.

words.tran_cn: 折衷的；选择的；折衷学派的
折衷派的人；折衷主义者

trans.tran_en: Eclecticism is the principle or practice of choosing or involving objects, ideas, and beliefs from many different sources
